original_title: A Comedy Salute to Andy Kaufman
overview: A one hour special broadcast on Comedy Central hosted by Bob Saget and Marilu Henner.  Includes many Andy Kaufman clips from SNL/David Letterman, and commentary from the Kaufman family, Richard Belzer, Jim Carrey, Rodney Dangerfield, and many other comics.
title: A Comedy Salute to Andy Kaufman
